title: Chromebooks get an official PWA for Webex Meetings [Video]
content:
The COVID-19 pandemic led to a huge number of video calls and a massive boom in sales of Chromebooks. As a result, Google’s desktop platform has gotten more attention from apps. Today in the midst of Google I/O, Cisco announced that Webex is getting an official PWA for Chromebooks.

more…

The post Chromebooks get an official PWA for Webex Meetings [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Cisco has announced that it is releasing an official PWA, Progressive Web App, to offer better support for WebEx on Chromebooks.
